_meta.description: EVE Online Epic Arc missions - faction standings without derived losses
_meta.notes: Epic arcs can be repeated every 90 days. Standing gain is ~10% of remaining to 10.0.

blood_stained_stars.name: The Blood-Stained Stars
blood_stained_stars.starting_station: Arnon IX - Moon 3 - Sisters of EVE Bureau

rewards.standing: Choice of any empire faction (+10% of remaining)

blood_stained_stars.notes: Newbie-friendly. Only epic arc with no standing requirement. Great for repairing any empire faction.

gallente_penumbra.name: Penumbra
gallente_penumbra.starting_station: Dodixie IX - Moon 20 - Federation Navy Assembly Plant
gallente_penumbra.standing_entity: Gallente Federation or Federal Intelligence Office
gallente_penumbra.notes: L4 combat missions. Some branching paths affect reward.

caldari_penumbra.name: Penumbra
caldari_penumbra.starting_station: Josameto II - Lai Dai Corporation Factory
caldari_penumbra.notes: L4 combat missions. Mirror of Gallente arc.

amarr_right_to_rule.name: Right to Rule
amarr_right_to_rule.starting_station: Kor-Azor Prime III - Kor-Azor Family Bureau
amarr_right_to_rule.standing_entity: Amarr Empire or Ministry of Internal Order
amarr_right_to_rule.notes: L4 combat. Some missions in low-sec.

minmatar_wildfire.name: Wildfire
minmatar_wildfire.starting_station: Frarn VI - Moon 1 - Republic Parliament Bureau
minmatar_wildfire.notes: L4 combat. Some missions in low-sec.

angel_cartel.name: Angel Sound
angel_cartel.notes: Pirate arc. Requires travel to null-sec. Dangerous.

guristas.name: Smash and Grab
guristas.notes: Pirate arc. Null-sec. Dangerous but lucrative.

standing_gain_formula.description: Epic arcs give approximately 10% of remaining standing to 10.0
standing_gain_formula.notes: Diminishing returns at high standings. Most valuable for repairing negative standings.

tips.repair_negative: Blood-Stained Stars is the best way to repair negative empire standings - no standing requirement and you choose which faction to boost
tips.no_derived_loss: Epic arcs don't cause derived standing losses - safe for multi-faction standings
tips.cooldown_tracking: Track your 90-day cooldowns - stagger arcs for continuous standing gains
tips.lowsec_missions: Amarr and Minmatar arcs have some low-sec missions - bring appropriate ship
